channel.title: [PI]Mouse is a bit off 317
channel.description:
Hi, I'm using project insanity and when i click something my actual mouse is a bit higher then what I'm clicking for example to wield a dds i would have to click a little bit above the dds to wield it I'm guessing this is a client bug does anyone know how to fix? also everyone using my server has this problem.
Edit: I also noticed theirs a little white line because Runescape doesn't fill the entire window.
[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/9788/unledmlb.png[/img]

item.title: [PI]Mouse is a bit off 317
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

I suggest you just use another client, because there are many PI clients which don’t have this.

Read full topic
